item.title: Setup Hugo
How I Remember Everything I Read by Ali Abdaal
item.description: Why should you read this article? If you can’t retain and apply what you have read into making your life better or solving problems better, reading this can give you some insight on what you can do to actually remember what you read and not only that to store it in your knowledge bank, long term memory, ready-to-be used whenever you need it. Accumalating knowledge in your long term memory can be very useful because it can serve as a building block or foundation knowledge for you to build upon when learning a more complicated concept/topic.
